name: TICEAS 2020: InfoSec, & CyberSecurity
content: The International Conference on Engineering and Applied Sciences are calling paper for the themes relevant to “Engineering and Applied Sciences” and our special session will be “InfoSec, & CyberSecurity” this year. Diverse edging technologies have been widely applied in our lives. Abundant personal data have been shared in apps and networks, how information security can be improved has become a significant issue discussed in the digital age. We sincerely welcome the research communities to promote connections between theory and practice with us from February 18-20, 2020 in Guam.
